job_tasks.phrase: lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the primary responsibility of building and leading the development of a software platform.

job_tasks.phrase: architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense
job_tasks.justification: This highlights core software engineering activities related to system design, implementation, and scaling.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop scalable, reliable, and high-performance software platform and services
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly states the design and development of software platforms and services, key aspects of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Leverage AI models and algorithms to transform threat defense and response from human-driven to AI-driven
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the utilization and implementation of AI models and algorithms for a specific function.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cybersecurity experts to understand their requirements and translate them into scalable technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the need to understand business/domain requirements (cybersecurity experts' needs) and translate them into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional software engineering teams to build end-to-end cyber defense solutions
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes collaboration within software engineering to build comprehensive solutions, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Deliver high-quality code, conduct code reviews, identify areas for improvement, and mentor junior software engineers
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software development practices focused on code quality, review, and team development.

soft_skills.phrase: lead the development of the next generation AI-powered security platform
architect, implement and scale industry-leading security solutions for cyber defense
The security landscape is constantly evolving, and with the adoption of ML/GenAI backed by extensive heterogeneous data, security threats are inevitably broadened.
collaborate with cross-functional security and engineering teams
play a key role in shaping our cybersecurity strategy
Collaborate with cross-functional software engineering teams

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes software development and the integration of AI models into a security platform. While it mentions 'AI models and algorithms', the core focus is on the engineering and scaling of solutions, rather than deep algorithmic research or fine-tuning of generative models specifically. The responsibilities align more with building and operationalizing ML-driven systems within a broader software engineering context.
